attributes.title: Complete trash 🤢🤮
attributes.review: Kept making my phone completely crash every time I tried to open it. Kicked me out within two seconds. Couldn’t even see what was on the app. THEN I got spammed by a bunch of notifications. Like 20-30 notifications every five minutes. Don’t get this

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because the yt people told me to, but what the yt people didnt tell me was how dissatisfied I would be with the app. The app constantly crashed and the messages it would send me were utterly disturbing. The images upon opening the app were off putting to the eye and in all honesty insulting. I am thoroughly disappointed.

attributes.title: This app can burn in hell 🔥
attributes.review: Trump is a racist, sexist, homophobic, islamaphobic, liar who cheated his way into office. AND he didn’t even help with covid-19 ONCE! I could go on about why trump is terrible but I’ll save those facts for later. Anyway, I heard your trying to be TikTok. If you take down TikTok, we’re taking down your official app with us!!!!! Thank you for your time.😁

attributes.title: Trump’s a dictator
attributes.review: Trump is trying to silence anyone who has different opinions from his own. He only allows yes people around him. He listens to people who kiss his booty and no one else. He is trying to force governors of states to blindly follow him, and if they don’t he bullies them. He is an immature child who should have stayed a business man and not gotten into politics.

attributes.title: this app killed my hamster(rip harold)
attributes.review: this app took away the life of my wonderful little hamster harold. when i went to the app, my phone overheated and exploded, taking the life of my hamster.  he was such a joyous creature. oh how i loved little harold. he was my best friend. i would do everything with harold. i would take harold on a walk💔 and bring him to the supermarket. RIP HAROLD❤️💕✨🥺😤😣

attributes.title: THE ABSOLUTE WORST APP (and merch🤢)
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see if it would change my view on our mysoginistic, racist, transphobic, pedophilic, rapist, oops sorry girl i got carried away😳. anywho it took 4 days to download😐like what? that wasn’t even the worst part! i stared getting a BUNCH of calls, texts and emails from the app trying to get me to buy that ugly merch- ugh as if🤢. DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.title: Simply aweful and a waste of storage
attributes.review: I downloaded this so I can be a patriotic American but instead what I found was a flaming garbage pile of glitchy features and thinly failed fascism. Non stop adds from China. And I think I downloaded a virus that the app could have prevented. I think it’s called Coda? Rona? Oh corona. Anyways, DONT GET THIS APP. It’s a waste of your storage and brain power.

attributes.title: Read before download
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app it gave me one of those agreements that nobody reads so I just clicked agreed and my hole screen went black my phone powered off and it took 45 minutes to a hour to start up and all my text messages and photos a deleted do not!!! Download this app

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is possibly the worst one I’ve ever seen. Not sure if bunker boy himself put it together but sure seems like it. Very low quality app and right away asks for a phone number. I don’t even have a chance to breathe before grumpy trumpy is asking for my digits. I thought our Cheeto puff of a President was better than that. 🤩😍🥰😘❤️💕🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: awful!!!!!!
attributes.review: after it took an entire week to download, this app charged me $500 😾and stole my identity. i had three men in black suits come to my house and delete the flappy bird app (which i can NEVER get back now) 😿and then they tried to sell me trump merch as a bribe to leave me alone. this app is scary!! if i could give it 0 stars i would😠😠😠
